name: Release
on:
  push:
    tags: 
      - release/[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+
jobs:
  lint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '16.16.0'
      - run: npm run ci
      - run: npm run lint
  build:
    needs: lint
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@master
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '16.16.0'
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install
      - name: Build project
        run: npm run build
  edit-ticket:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - shell: bash
        env:
          YA_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.YA_TOKEN }}
          COMPANY_ID: ${{ secrets.COMPANY_ID }}
        run: |
         chmod +x ./scripts/edit_ticket.sh
         ./scripts/edit_ticket.sh >> $EXIT_STATUS
          echo "Exit status= $EXIT_STATUS"
